entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
